price: 我确已派遣努哈去教化他的宗族，他说：“我的宗族啊！你们应当崇拜安拉，除他之外，绝无应受你们崇拜的。难道你们不敬畏吗？”
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦ فَقَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنۡ إِلَٰهٍ غَيۡرُهُۥٓۚ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaqad arsalnā nūḥan ilā qawmihi faqāla yāqawmi uʿ'budū al-laha mā lakum min ilāhin ghayruhu afalā tattaqūna
